message:
Oh man.  Just the intro for the 3D engine already had me snortling in my latte:

http://www.gametrailers.com/video/engine-promo-beard/717301
Tried the demo. Will possibly get when it goes on sale one day.

@ZAnimus Funny thing is, I *did* do a search.  And as I type now, said search still doesn't throw up any results:

http://www.google.com/search?q=splosion+site:convore.com/take2
